Text.Page:
Mekonaris, devas, undead, and now kulkaris? Enough!

This Bleakrock tribe are just thugs for whoever's in charge. I'm sure they're here in exchange for plunder, but I want them stopped.

Range out to the east there and kill all of their precious shamans that you can. Don't bloody their noseâ€”break it!
Damn fine work! Give their staves to Keallach. Their loss is our gain!
The shamans are kulkari leaders. Slaughter a dozen or so and these bullies will scurry back under their rock!
Oh, these are powerful! Hmm, yes! We can use these. My thanks, <PCCLASS:lcase>.
